‘Our purpose is simply to make the timeless understanding
of our shared being freely available to everyone’

RUPERT SPIRA

Our founder, Rupert Spira, shares the
vision and purpose of the Foundation

“The understanding that lies at the heart of all the great religious and spiritual traditions reveals that peace and happiness are the very nature of your being, and that you share your being with everyone and everything. The Foundation develops projects that make this understanding readily available to everyone, free of charge.”

RUPERT SPIRA

New publication for children

The Blue Sky of Happiness

New children’s book

In this gentle and uplifting story, author Rupert Spira invites readers to look beyond the passing clouds of thoughts and feelings to discover the vast, unchanging blue sky of our shared being.

With luminous artwork by award-winning illustrator Zuzanna Celej.

Free in-person event

Meeting in Devon, UK

Dartington Hall     November 7th 7–9pm

Join us for an evening at the historic Dartington Hall to explore our shared being. The monthly event begins with a guided meditation led by Rupert Spira, followed by a Q&A session, offering an opportunity to engage directly with the teachings. Free to attend, with donations kindly appreciated.

Learn more

SHARED MISSION

Supporting the Marici Foundation

Empowering survivors

The Rupert Spira Foundation supports the Marici Foundation in their mission to reduce child sex trafficking and rescue survivors. Marici also empowers survivors with healing, education, and hope for a brighter future.

Learn more

Publication for children

I Am Always I

A gentle story pointing to who you truly are

It's not always easy trying to figure out who you are in this ever‑changing world. In this delightful book, author Rupert Spira takes you on a journey of discovery through a landscape of thoughts, feelings and circumstances to the essence of who you are. With exquisite artwork by award‑winning illustrator Zuzanna Celej.
